name: Panic (Watched It for the Plot)
description:
This game was made for LD 48 -  Deeper and Deeper

Starts with getting caught stealing, and spirals down deeper and deeper.

After stealing have to make sure the onlookers don't call the police otherwise ggs.

Supports a game over state, but currently no win state

If the web version isn't loading try downloading the Windows build below.

ESC to quit out of Windows build

Song:

Casa Bossa Nova by Kevin MacLeod https://incompetech.com/
